entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light late this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
